This app needs specific permission to keep running in the background, this allows the app to listen for specific texts and run the alerts
Tap to re-check for required permissions
&appname; will not function due to SMS denied, enable in settings to continue
You must allow SMS permission for this app to function

The Receive SMS permission is required so that the app may intercept sms and process who is the sender, this is needed so that the app can fire an alert when an sms is received from a sender listed in one of the user created alerts.

Without this permission this app cannot function at all.

Clicking OK will ask you to grant permission again
Select a ringtone for the alert
Create a new alert by tapping + below
You need to enter an alert name
You need to enter a valid number or text
You need to enter max seconds to ring for
Phone numbers should not contain any special characters or spaces other than +
